LanguageData.Plant_USTangleroot.label: Tangleroot
LanguageData.Plant_USTangleroot.description: A genetically modified shrub with razor sharp thorns.
LanguageData.USTanglerootThorns.label: Tangleroot Thorns
LanguageData.USTanglerootThorns.description: Harvested thorns of the tangleroot. These thorns are extremely sharp and contain various potent chemical alkaloids.
